jd: From: gaurav, ValiantIQ ggautam@valiantiq.com Reply to: ggautam@valiantiq.com Role: Senior Workday Product Specialist/Project manager Type of Role: ContractLocation:- Boston, MA Hybrid (2-3 days per week in office)Need Local Candidate for this role.
